description: When attempting to use a MemoryView to access a Bytearray, a runtime error occurs. The error indicates that the MemoryView is unable to interpret the Bytearray properly and is unable to properly access the data stored in the Bytearray.
code:
# Create a Bytearray
byte_arr = bytearray([0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x04, 0x05])

# Create a MemoryView
mem_view = memoryview(byte_arr)
